## Client.newCollection() method

newCollection registers a new collection schema under the given name. The schema must be a valid json-schema.org schema, and can be a JSON string or object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newCollection(threadID: ThreadID, name: string, schema: any, indexes?: pb.Index.AsObject[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  threadID | ThreadID | the ID of the database |
|  name | string | The human-readable name for the collection. |
|  schema | any | The actual json-schema.org compatible schema object. |
|  indexes | pb.Index.AsObject\[\] | A set of index definitions for indexing instance fields. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
